meaningMnemonic: Someone who's only been a <kanji>military officer</kanji> for a <kanji>few</kanji> years hasn't been able to get very far in the ranks. They're an <vocabulary>ensign</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>second lieutenant</vocabulary>. That's still not a bad position to be in!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
